騯騯騯

騯字的基本解释

騯
péng
〔騯騯〕马行进的样子。亦作“彭彭”。

騯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄庚切，平庚，並。］
［《廣韻》步光切，平唐，並。］
(1)马行貌。
(2)见“騯騯”。

騯字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騯； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1442第34
【唐韻】薄庚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲庚切，?音彭。【說文】騯騯，馬行貌。【詩·小雅】四牡騯騯。　又【韻會】通作彭。【詩·小雅】出車彭彭。【大雅】駟騵彭彭。【魯頌】以車彭彭。皆壯盛意。【詩緝】詩中彭彭?如字，俗讀如邦，誤。　又【廣韻】步光切【集韻】蒲光切，?音傍。【廣韻】馬盛貌。　又【集韻】補朗切，音榜。義同。《詩·小雅·北山》一本作四牡彭彭。

騯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
騯字的起名意思

暂无。

騯
Basic explanation of words
騯
péng
〔騯騯〕The way a horse is marching. Also known as "Peng Peng".
騯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" Bo Gengqie, Ping Geng, and. ]
["Guangyun" step light cut, Ping Tang, and merge. ]
(1) Horse appearance.
(2) See "騯騯".
騯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　騯; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1442 Page 34
[Tang Yun] Bo Gengqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Pu Gengqie,? Yinpeng. [Said the text] 騯騯, the horse looks like a horse. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Four males.　[Rhyme Club] Tong Zuo Peng. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Peng Peng out of the car. [Daya] Peng Peng, a siege. [Lu Song] Peng Peng with a car. All are strong and hospitable. [Poetry] Peng Peng in the poem? Like words, popular reading like a state, wrong.　[Guang Yun] step light cut [Ji Yun] Pu light cut,? Yin Bang. [Guang Yun] Ma Sheng looks.　[Jiyun] To make up for Langqie, sound chart. The same meaning. "Poetry·Xiaoya·North Mountain" is composed of Peng Peng with four males.

Name meaning
Nothing.
péng, bǎng
loud, noisy, boisterous; fight
